Summary: Orange fireball, silent, traveling in straight line East-Northeast.
divs: sighting detailsi was pulling up behind my house when i saw an orange light in the sky coming in my direction, being the fourth of july night i assumed fireworks. it didn't fade, explode or change directions, i live by an air base so i thought strange plane at this point, i shut off my car and music and got out to listen to see if it made a jet noise, it was probably within a half mile of my location at this point. no sound whatsoever! i was freaked out at this point and ran inside to grab my wife to see it too to make sure i wasn't crazy, by the time we got back outside it was traveling away from us, she was blown away-she also saw four silver\white legs equidistant around the center which was an orange, glowing spinning sphere. it went east-northeast not more than 1500-2000 ft off the ground, about 45 sec to 1 min speed horizon to horizon. it disappeared behind some trees and we couldn't get in location to see it anymore. we were amazed and in disbelief at what we saw. i got on here and saw others around the country saw the same thing and had to share.
